Name: }bedrock.chore.execution.check

Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pMonthDays
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimited string of days in month as dd e.g. 01 & 02 & 30 & 31 (Blank=All)

Parameters.Name: pWeekDays
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Delimited string of days in week as ddd e.g. MON & WED (Blank=All)

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: String array delimiter. Only 1 character allowed (Blank=&)

Parameters.Name: pStartTime
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Time to start running chore from in 24 hr time (at start of hour) (Blank=0)

Parameters.Name: pEndTime
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Time to finish chore being able to start in 24 hr time (Blank=24)

Parameters.Name: pScheduleTimezone
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Timezone to check the days / hours in if it is different from server timezone

Parameters.Name: pServerTimezone
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Timezone for server if ScheduleTimezone is different
